scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:db"
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' npm run build
